name: MartianWorld
description:
In this project, I created unique colorful 3D objects that can be drawn on the screen. The user is able to do the following:

  1. Select which object to draw in dropdown button (bottom left) : left click- drags object (hold down left click), right click: draws 1 object
  2. Choose to destroy the object by clicking or unclicking Destroy (use left click) Destroy- destroys objects after 2 seconds
  3. Clear All is used to clear the screen (use right click)

 There are five different types of objects  the player can interact with. One is a extraterrestrial flower, a colorful flower, a planet, a spaceship and a capsule (which contains 3 different shapes all in one).  The mouse position is displayed on the top right corner of the screen. Enjoy !
